support-hed: BEFORE YOU GO, A QUICK REQUEST...
support-text: I hope you appreciated this article. Before you move on, I was hoping you would consider taking the step of supporting Spotlight PA's journalism — and taking advantage of a limited-time offer to get your gift MATCHED dollar for dollar by the Benter Foundation in Pittsburgh. This article and all of our journalism are available to you at no cost thanks to our supporters. We don't believe vital investigative and public-service journalism should be hidden behind a paywall or only for those who can afford a subscription fee. Everyone deserves access to the facts. Especially in tighter economic times, people should not be forced to choose between the essentials, and essential news. That's why we need your help now. Your support enables us to continue to produce tough, unique reporting you won't find anywhere else. And it also enables us to share that work with more than 90 newsroom partners in your community and communities across the state at no charge. From giant corporations to predatory hedge funds, a small number of billionaire owners have a powerful hold on so much of the information that reaches the public about what’s happening here. Spotlight PA is different. We have no billionaire owner or shareholders to consider. Our journalism is produced to serve the public interest – not profit motives. Our readers keep us independent, beholden to no outside influence, and accessible to everyone – whether they can afford to pay for news, or not. Will you do your part today by making a contribution? As a special bonus, all gifts made today will be DOUBLED thanks to a special matching gift offered by the Benter Foundation in Pittsburgh. You've been reading our work. Now join thousands of your friends and neighbors in supporting it. With gratitude, Christopher Baxter Editor in Chief
